actions: Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi, R Reduces swelling and generates flesh.
With Mo Yao, for chronic, ulcerated and non-healing sores and sores that are hard but not painful.
With Mo Yao, Xiong Huang and She Xiang, for unopened carbuncles and ulcerations.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, alleviates pain, reduces swelling, generates flesh and promotes healing.
Activates the Blood, dissipates masses, reduces swellings, detoxifies, opens the channels and alleviates pain.
With Ru Xiang and Mo Yao, for carbuncles, sores and hot swellings.
Relieves toxicity, dries Dampness and expels Phlegm.
With She Xiang, Ru Xiang and Mo Yao, for abscesses and other hard suppurative lesions.

syndromes: Abscesses characterized by redness and swelling

contraindications: Realgar Xiong Huang is toxic and no longer used.
Moschus She Xiang is derived from an endangered species and is no longer used.

notes: Mash the ingredients and form into pills with 30g of rice.take 9g at a time with aged grain-based liquor..
Use only for a short time.
